text:
When a ChainReaderHelper is used in the Concat, LoadFile and LoadProperties
tasks, the FilterMapper type, and FileUtils (or ResourceUtils now), the Project
is set on each ChainReaderHelper instance. But the Redirector does not set the
Project.

This makes it difficult to have a custom filter that can write to the log from a
redirector in (for example) an Exec task.

The fix is easy: add this line:

    helper.setProject(managingTask.getProject());

after each instatiation of ChainReaderHelper (lines 520, 549 and 587) in
taskdefs/Redirector.java.
